Material.Text:
"Dear Sir or Madam,



In reference to your advertisement in the Philadelphia Herald on February 24th, I would like to apply for the position of sales representative with your publishing company.


I am currently employed as a sales representative for an IT company. My main task is to develop and manage a client list, a role which I both enjoy and feel suited for. I am responsible for establishing contacts with potential new customers both at home and abroad, and I also conduct market research for new projects.


At the present time, I am looking for a company to fulfill the role of distributor in the Turkish market. As I already have experience working overseas, especially in the Middle East, I would welcome the opportunity to travel around the world for business.
"

Where is this conversation taking place?
Which of the following statements is probably true?

AnswerSentence.Text: Both speakers experienced delays on the train.
